sections.title: Avell
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
A40 LIV | 2022-04-13 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Hibernation untested |  | Small annoyances with brightness during reboot.
A70 MOB (RTX3060 version) | 2022-09-18 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Hibernation untested* | Thunderbolt: Untested | *Performance is severely affected after waking from suspend, solution on the forums.

sections.title: Casper
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
Nirvana X600.5700 | 2024-01-24 | Yes | Yes | – | Yes | Yes | Hibernation untested | Internal keyboard only works with some kernel versions. See BBS#291569 | Add pnpacpi=off kernel parameter to fix internal keyboard.

sections.title: Chuwi
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
Corebook X (2022) | 2022-06-26 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | No, battery undetected | Camera works
MiniBook X (2023) | 2023-09-24 | Yes* | Yes | – | Yes | No | Yes |  | *Screen rotation needs to be set up to work correctly
MiniBook X N100 (2023) | 2023-12-29 | Yes | Yes | – | Yes | Yes | Yes | Camera works, dual accelerometer does not work* | *Screen rotation needs a workaround, tablet mode is impossible.

dual accelerometer does not work*

sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
NP50DB | 2020-09-25 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Hibernation: Untested |  | Keyboard LEDs work with clevo-drivers-dkms-gitAUR.
N130BU | 2017-12-27 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Untested | Touchpad works with libinput but awkard default config ("Tapping" disabled) | Many small annoyances as some functionalities are not working out of the box.
M350 | 2006-01-05 | Yes | Yes | Yes | – | – | Partial: Hibernate not working | IEEE-1394: Untested | Front panel keys does not work
W150HRM | 2011-08-19 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Untested | Untested |  | 
W110ER | 2013-04-01 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes* | Yes | Yes | USB3: Untested | *Unreliable on some 802.11n networks: workaround by disabling 802.11n with 11n_disable=1Tested only in BIOS mode, not in UEFI.

sections.title: Fujitsu
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
Lifebook WU4/H1 | 2023-06-03 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Fingerprint reader: Yes. | 
Lifebook U747 | 2023-01-01 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Suspend does not work* | Internal keyboard requires serio_raw serio atkbd psmouse i8042 in the initramfs to be reliably detected at boot. | *The device does not wake again. Otherwise, the suspend process seems to work.
Lifebook T902 | 2017-08-01 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Touchscreen drivers needs to be manually removed and re-added after suspend. | Rotation lock, A and B buttons do nothing.Tablet mode essentially unusable: rotating screen and disabling the keyboard / touchpad automatically does not work.
Lifebook T904 | 2014 | Yes | Untested | Untested | Yes | Untested | Untested | The fingerprint reader does not appear to be a supported model. If unused, consider disabling physically in the BIOS. | Update BIOS to version 1.08 to fix fan noise.
Amilo Se 1520 | 2007 | Yes | Yes* | Untested | Yes | – | Yes |  | *SPDIF and external microphone do not work. Internal microphone cannot be disabled and has no volume control.Special buttons on the left side of the keyboard do not work out of the box.

sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
MX6961 | 2007-05 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Hibernation untested | Modem: Untested | Fn keys for brightness and volume are unsupported.

sections.title: Gigabyte
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
Aero 14k | 2018-02-07 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Thunderbolt: Untested | Reset the BIOS to Windows 7 settings to boot the ArchISO. Macro keys have to be defined using the windows application.
P34G v2 aka XMG C404 | 2020-06-27 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Poor power management drains the battery |  | Touchpad intermittent on boot/reset with XMG firmware, works fine with attempted coreboot port, but could not figure out power management: device runs hot
Aero 15 Classic XA | 2021-11-12 | Yes* | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |  | *very low performance with HDMI, use Thunderbolt 3 docking station instead.To use the webcam, enable the webcam option in BIOS manually (from default 'AUTO').Macro keys have to be defined using the windows application.
Aorus 17 XE4 | 2022-08-18 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Wake-from-suspend issue needs a workaround, and using NVIDIA's proprietary driver (i.e. not nvidia-open).Kernel parameters nowatchdog acpi_osi=! acpi_osi='Windows 2015' may also be necessary.
U4 | 2023-02-12 | Yes | Yes | – | Yes | Yes | Untested | Untested: SD-card reader | Update to newest UEFI version to (partially) fix freezes on the GRUB menu when interacting or opening its' terminal. External USB keyboards will not work on the UEFI or grub menu. Default NVME drive (ESR512GTLG-E6GBTNB4) has a very fragile firmware. If issued any NVME or S.M.A.R.T command, all filesystems fail to mount. The only known fix is to reboot. Also does not support any kind of namespace manipulation.

Macro keys have to be defined using the windows application.

Default NVME drive (ESR512GTLG-E6GBTNB4) has a very fragile firmware. If issued any NVME or S.M.A.R.T command, all filesystems fail to mount. The only known fix is to reboot. Also does not support any kind of namespace manipulation.

sections.title: Lunnen
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
Ground 16 | 2024-02-13 | Yes | Yes | – | Yes | Yes | Yes |  | Add amdgpu.sg_display=0 to the kernel parameters to fix flickering screen after sleep and pnpacpi=off to fix not working keyboard. Do not forget to turn off Fastboot in BIOS when you disable pnpacpi.

sections.title: Mechrevo
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | Video | Sound | Ethernet | Wireless | Bluetooth | Power management | Other | Remarks
S2 Air | 2020-08-05 | Yes* | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Untested |  | *HDMI 2.0 (4K@60FPS) is noisy, favor HDMI 1.4 (4k@30FPS or lower)
Code 01 (Tongfang PF5NU1G) | 2020-10-14 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |  | Fn+F5 does not seem to have any effect
Code 01 v2 (Ryzen 7 6800H ver, 2022) | 2024-01-29 | Yes | External earphone needs a second reboot to work | Yes | Yes | Yes | Suspend does not work when using amd_pstate=guided scheduler. Default scheduler works fine |  | Needs to configure CPU from bios before install
WUJIE14S | 2024-09-14 | Yes | Yes | No port | Yes | Yes | Yes |  | F2 for UEFI, F7 for boot entries. Fn+x switch performance mode (EC controlled, independent of OS). Fn+arrow does not have a second layer.
